summary: Inner city kids from a poor neighborhood go up against the undefeated Beverly Hills Junior National Karate Team.
cast: Phillip Rhee|Mirelly Taylor|Max Gail|Adam Irigoyen|Ryan Potter|Ted McGinley|Lauren Bowles|Ellia English|Cade Sutton|Nicolas Bechtel|Rayna Vallandingham|Lorenz Arnell|Aidan Considine|Andrew Franklin|Sebastian Saraceno|Patrick Cox|Tonja Kahlens|Sean Rhee|Tyler Weaver Jr.|Seth Lee|John Kapelos|Sonya Leslie|Gary Anthony Stennette|Patrick Fabian|Tom Arnold|Greg Grunberg|Beau Bridges|Julien Giancana|Hayden Kollerbohm|Cameron Whorton|Kiko Ellsworth|Dallas Liu|Itay Zander|Ron Yuan|Steve Jackson|Kiara Finn|Brett Brennen|Steve Cooper|Melinda 'Mo' Ota|Baracha Krueger|Jun Chong|Dan Inosanto|Benny Urquidez|Don Wilson|Richard Norton|David Jason Perez|Darin Kyle Nadal|Vonte|Jaron Adams|John Alexenko|Christopher Craven|Marc Graue|Alfred Hsing|Athena Talin Katalaris|Rose Liston|Sophie Sabatini|Albert Serrato
title: Underdog Kids
